Class TransactionProperties

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.transaction.autoconfigure.TransactionProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionManagerCustomizer<AbstractPlatformTransactionManager>
@ConfigurationProperties("spring.transaction") public class TransactionProperties extends Object implements TransactionManagerCustomizer<AbstractPlatformTransactionManager>
Configuration properties that can be applied to an AbstractPlatformTransactionManager.
Since:
4.0.0
Author:
Kazuki Shimizu, Phillip Webb
